title: Vertex AI Search and Conversation - About recommendations
abstract:
# Vertex AI Search and Conversation - About recommendations
With Vertex AI Search, you can create two different types of recommendations apps:
- **Media recommendations.** Recommendations for media content such as videos, news, and music. With media recommendations, audiences can discover more personalized content, like what to watch or read next, with Google-quality results customized using optimization objectives.
- **Generic recommendations (Preview).** Recommendations for non-media content.
content:
## How media recommendations and generic recommendations differ
There are many similarities between media recommendations and generic recommendations. However, there are some differences between them. These differences are outlined in the following table:
| Media recommendations                                   | Generic recommendations                        |
|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Data stores are always structured.                                | Data stores can be of any type (website, unstructured, structured).             |
| Requires structured data with a predefined schema.                            | Schemas are optional for structured data.                    |
| You can create a data store only at the end of the app creation workflow.                      | You can create a data store independently of creating an app.               |
| You can't create an app without connecting a data store to it.                         | You can create an app or a data store in any order and connect them later.           |
| You must create and connect at least one data store at the end of the app creation workflow. You can create and connect multiple data stores to the app later. | You can create an app without any data store.                   |
| You can create empty data stores and add data to them later.                         | You cannot create an empty data store. You must import data into a data store during the data store creation process. |
| You can connect multiple apps to a single data store.                           | You must connect only one app to a data store.                  |
| Data store contains documents and user events.                             | Data store contains documents.                      |
| Imported historical user events are joined synchronously.                          | Imported historical user events are joined asynchronously.               |
For more information about the topics from the preceding table, see:
- [Create a media app and a data store](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/create-app-data-store-media-recommendations) 
- [Import data into a media recommendations data store](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/import-data-media-recommendations) 
- [Create a generic recommendations data store](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/create-data-store-recommendations) 
- [Create a generic recommendations app](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/create-engine-personalize) 
- [Import historical user events](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/import-user-events) 
- [JSON Schema for Document](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/media-documents#json-schema)
